Remove Censored Volumes and Update Confounds

Source: R/postprocess_functions.R
scrub_timepoints.Rd

Removes timepoints flagged in a censor file from a 4D NIfTI image. When confound_files are provided, the corresponding rows in those files are removed so that the time series remain aligned.

Usage

scrub_timepoints(
  in_file,
  censor_file = NULL,
  out_desc = NULL,
  confound_files = NULL,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  lg = NULL
)

Arguments

in_file

Path to the input 4D NIfTI file.

censor_file

Path to the 1D censor vector used to identify volumes to remove.

out_desc

The BIDS description field for the file output by this step

confound_files

Optional character vector of confound or regressor files to update alongside the fMRI data.

overwrite

Logical; overwrite the output NIfTI if it exists.

lg

Optional Logger object for message output.

Value

The path to the scrubbed NIfTI image.
